languages.text: "Что? Снова? Ручки и поручни в голубых покоях надраиваются пять раз в день! Почему не отправить сервитора?"

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Почему вечно я? Я уже убирался там вчера, там вечно помойка

languages.text: "What? Again? The handles and the handrails in the blue chambers are polished five times a day! Might as well send a servitor!"
languages.original_text: "Что? Снова? Ручки и поручни в голубых покоях надраиваются пять раз в день! Почему не отправить сервитора?"

traits.locale_text: "What? Again? The handles and the handrails in the blue chambers are polished five times a day! Might as well send a servitor!"
"What? Again? The handles and the handrails in the blue chambers are polished five times a day! Might as well send a servitor!"
"What? Again? The handles and the handrails in the blue chambers are polished five times a day! Might as well send a servitor!"
"What? Again? The handles and the handrails in the blue chambers are polished five times a day! Might as well send a servitor!"
"What? Again? The handles and the handrails in the blue chambers are polished five times a day! Might as well send a servitor!"

languages.text: “什么？还去蓝色大厅？那边的把手和扶手每天都要擦上五次！这个活还不如派个机仆来干呢！”
languages.original_text: "What? Again? The handles and the handrails in the blue chambers are polished five times a day! Might as well send a servitor!"

traits.locale_text: “什么？还去蓝色大厅？那边的把手和扶手每天都要擦上五次！这个活还不如派个奴工来干呢！”

languages.text: «¿Cómo? ¿Otra vez? ¡Pero si ya limpiamos las manillas y los pasamanos de los aposentos azules cinco veces al día! ¡Para eso podrían enviar un servidor!».
languages.original_text: "What? Again? The handles and the handrails in the blue chambers are polished five times a day! Might as well send a servitor!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Cómo? ¿Otra vez? ¡Pero si ya limpiamos las manillas y los pasamanos de los aposentos azules cinco veces al día! ¡Para eso podrían enviar un servidor!».

languages.text: 「え？また？青の部屋の取っ手や手すりは1日5回も磨いてるんだ！そんなのはサーヴィターに任せればいいじゃないか！」
languages.original_text: "What? Again? The handles and the handrails in the blue chambers are polished five times a day! Might as well send a servitor!"

traits.locale_text: 「え？また？青の部屋の取っ手や手すりは1日5回も磨いてるんだ！そんなのはサーヴィターに任せればいいじゃないか！」

languages.text: "Was? Schon wieder? Die Griffe und der Handlauf in den blauen Kammern werden fünfmal täglich poliert! Schickt doch einen Servitor!"
languages.original_text: "What? Again? The handles and the handrails in the blue chambers are polished five times a day! Might as well send a servitor!"

traits.locale_text: "Was? Schon wieder? Die Griffe und der Handlauf in den blauen Kammern werden fünfmal täglich poliert! Schickt doch einen Servitor!"

languages.text: « Comment ? Encore ? Les poignées des chambres bleues sont polies cinq fois par jour ! Autant y envoyer un servitor ! »
languages.original_text: "What? Again? The handles and the handrails in the blue chambers are polished five times a day! Might as well send a servitor!"

traits.locale_text: « Comment ? Encore ? Les poignées des chambres bleues sont polies cinq fois par jour ! Autant y envoyer un servitor ! »

languages.text: "Ne? Yine mi? Mavi odadaki merdiven parmaklıkları ve topuzları günde beş kere cilalanıyor! Hizmetör göndersek ya!"
languages.original_text: "What? Again? The handles and the handrails in the blue chambers are polished five times a day! Might as well send a servitor!"

traits.locale_text: "Ne? Yine mi? Mavi odadaki merdiven parmaklıkları ve topuzları günde beş kere cilalanıyor! Servitör göndersek daha iyi!"
